item.title: Find a item in lists in js: Performance of Set vs Array
item.description: In our apps, it’s very common to store data in lists, for example, a list of users, a list of posts, a list of selected ids, etc, and also it’s very common too need to check if a value is in the list or not. In most cases, we use simple arrays to store the data, and we use the includes method to check if a value is in the array or not.
